changelog:
* Stable release, mandatory update
* Ask for PIN on GetAddress and GetPublicKey
* Signing speed improved
* Bug fixes for Account Label Setting

* Stable release, mandatory update
* Added support for Mycelium 2.3.1 and above
* Added support for Electrum
* Added setting for account label
* Added option to change home screen
* Added support for message encrypt/decrypt
* Added option to enable/disable passphrase
* Added visual validation of receiving address
* Removed cpu_sn in Features Message
* Enabled stack overflow protection

* Stable release, mandatory update
* Added stack overflow protection
* Added chinese language support

* Stable release, mandatory update
* Added stack overflow protection
* Added chinese language support
